text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_s r04_octave r05_quatrain r06_line r07_phr

LMNL.text: When I consider how my light is spent,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_s r04_octave r05_quatrain
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_s r04_octave r05_quatrain r08_line r09_phr

r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_s r04_octave r05_quatrain r08_line r10_phr

LMNL.text: in this dark world and wide,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_s r04_octave r05_quatrain
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_s r04_octave r05_quatrain r11_line r12_phr

LMNL.text: And that one talent which is death to hide,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_s r04_octave r05_quatrain

LMNL.text: Either man's work or his own gifts,

LMNL.text: And post o'er land and ocean without rest:

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r37_tercet r39_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r37_tercet r39_s r42_line r43_phr

LMNL.text: They also serve who only stand and wait.
